input.sentences: these shoes ran their first marathon yesterday .
i helped make sure the kids marathon ran smoothly | as they gathered at registration .
the kids ran hard and fast .
overall the event was a success so i took a selfie to show how pleased i was with myself .
output.sentences: Tom excitedly puts on his running shoes and prepares for his church's 5k run with the youth group.
As he walks up to the event, he is thrilled to see that there are already a ton of kids eagerly waiting to sign up at the registration booth.
Once Tom and everyone is registered, the run begins and all the participants take off!
Upon finishing the 5k, Tom and the rest of the racers head over to the food tents to eat after a satisfying exercise.
After Tom finishes eating, he thanks everyone for a great event and heads to his car to drive home.
